response.overview: A solitary scholar discovers an ancient bottle while on a trip to Istanbul and unleashes a djinn who offers her three wishes. Filled with reluctance, she is unable to come up with one, so the djinn tries to inspire her with his stories.
response.title: Three Thousand Years of Longing

cast.name: Berk Ozturk
cast.character: Semih the Driver / Bazzar Young Shopkeeper
